bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Cable Connections for Gas-Insulated Substations
Redline
IEEE Guide for Cable Connections for Gas-Insulated Substations - Redline
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std 1300-2011 (Revision of IEEE Std 1300-1996) - Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This guide establishes typical dimensions for connections of a gas-insulated substation (GIS) to extruded, self contained fluid-filled, and high pressure fluid-filled (pipe-type) cables in single and three phase arrangements for voltages 72.5 kV to 550 kV.

This guide establishes typical dimensions for connections of a gas-insulated substation (GIS) to extruded, self contained fluid-filled, and high pressure fluid-filled (pipe-type) cables in single and three phase arrangements for voltages 72.5 kV to 550 kV.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
